title: Vegan Chaos: Welcome Meet & Greet
description:
**Finally Congress again! The Vegan Chaos Community is a forum for vegan hacktivists and people concerned about animal rights and sustainable development.**

Are you interested in these topics? Do you have an idea that you would like to realise or are you already active somewhere in the field of veganism? Or do you just want to network with like-minded people? Either way, come to our Meet & Greet on Day 1!

We will get to know each other, present what has happened so far and make valuable connections - for the upcoming days here in Hamburg and beyond! All Creatures are Welcome!

### More Information:

- To the **[Vegan Chaos Community Assembly](https://events.ccc.de/congress/2025/hub/en/assembly/detail/vegan_chaos)**
- Follow us at Mastodon: **[@vegan@chaos.social](//chaos.social/@vegan)**

### Our Events:

-  28.12.  |  11:30  |  Assembly |  **[Vegan Chaos: Let's Talk](https://events.ccc.de/congress/2025/hub/en/event/detail/vegan-chaos-lets-talk-day-2)**
